title: WTA Premier, Charleston Women's Singles Results
text: April 3, 2018 / 1:22 AM / Updated 32 minutes ago WTA Premier, Charleston Women's Singles Results Reuters Staff 2 Min Read Apr 3 (OPTA) - Results from the WTA Premier, Charleston Women's Singles matches on Monday .. 1st Round .. 1-Caroline Garcia (FRA) (Bye) Varvara Lepchenko (USA) beat Andrea Petkovic (GER) 6-4 7-5 Polona Hercog (SLO) beat Maryna Zanevska (UKR) 6-1 6-4 14-Alize Cornet (FRA) beat Kateryna Bondarenko (UKR) 6-1 6-2 12-Kiki Bertens (NED) beat Veronica Cepede Royg (PAR) 6-4 6-1 Aleksandra Krunic (SRB) beat Bethanie Mattek-Sands 6-2 6-2 (USA) Fanny Stollar (HUN) beat Francesca Di Lorenzo (USA) 7-5 6-1 6-Johanna Konta (GBR) (Bye) 4-Sloane Stephens (USA) (Bye) Bernarda Pera (USA) beat Jana Cepelova (SVK) 6-2 6-2 15-Mihaela Buzarnescu beat Vera Lapko (BLR) 6-4 (ROU) (Retired) Daria Gavrilova (AUS) beat Ons Jabeur (TUN) 1-6 6-4 6-3 Camila Giorgi (ITA) beat Silvia Soler Espinosa 6-1 6-4 (ESP) 7-Madison Keys (USA) (Bye) 5-Julia Goerges (GER) (Bye) Laura Siegemund (GER) beat Natalia Vikhlyantseva 7-5 6-2 (RUS) 10-Naomi Osaka (JPN) beat Jennifer Brady (USA) 6-4 6-4 Christina McHale (USA) beat Zarina Diyas (KAZ) 6-4 6-2 3-Daria Kasatkina (RUS) (Bye) 8-Anastasija Sevastova (Bye) (LAT) Caroline Dolehide (USA) beat Johanna Larsson (SWE) 5-7 6-0 6-4 2-Petra Kvitova (CZE) (Bye)
